messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Re: Funniest explanations of unschooling by your ...
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/27/2004 12:25:25 PM Central Standard Time, Wishbone@supercity.ca writes: I wish  it were tommorrow. I kept my mouth shut because I didn t
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/27/2004 12:25:25 PM Central Standard Time,
Wishbone@... writes:

I wish it were tommorrow. I kept my mouth shut because I didn't want to step
on Catherine's toes but I was getting a little steamed myself at the dentist
and her half distracted conversation. If she didn't want answers why ask the
questions? Imagine how interesting it could have been for her if she'd just
listened. Oh well...Her loss.

Dawn (in NS)



~~~

But I did get to explain unschooling to my son's dentist while he was asking
Will the same kinds of questions. I even used Will's experience with an
abcessed tooth as an example of experiential learning. ;)

Karen


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
